name: Night Ghosts
description:
How to play?

Try to survive as many days as you can by building your home during the day and escaping from the ghosts during the night.

Try to build a solid home! And try to find the best strategy to survive as many days as you can!

This game was made for the Trijam#164 under the theme: "Day/Night cycle"

Gameplay video:
Controls:

A & D: Move right and left

W: jump

Mouse Left Click: Build
